storyInfo: Tachanka sees first-hand how Ursus uses the Infected as an excuse to exploit villagers who are too weak to fight back. After witnessing this, he is no longer able to stand on the sidelines.

attributes.content: 'It should be almost winter where you are by the time this letter arrives.'
'I imagine winter in Ursus is even harsher.'
'I hope you can come back sooner rather than later.'
'I hope you haven't been dragged into the mess over there.'
'One last friendly reminder.'
'I know your style, but don't get too involved.'
'Good luck, Lord.'
'Don't get too involved'?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: It's a little too late for that.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Alexsandr looks at the device before him, sighs, and puts away the letter.
His breath turns to white fog in the cool air.
It is a strange piece of machinery, with roughly polished metal rails and slightly rusted plates.
Alexsandr carefully maneuvers a wooden crane, putting in the finishing touches next to the strange device.
An Originium engine hangs beneath the crane, the last piece of the puzzle for this strange device.
Done!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Coupling, check. Where's my wrench?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Where on Earth is my level?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The soldier reaches into a box and takes out a level made from birch and glass, calibrating the connection between the engine and the machine.
Let's see...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Power supply, check. Voltage...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Where am I supposed to find a voltmeter in this place?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: How the hell did they do this in the 50s?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: This torque better be enough.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: After a few minutes, the sound of machine rumbling begins to echo in the warehouse.
Aha!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: There we go! Hahaha!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: It's moving! It's moving!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Mr. Alexsandr?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Good morning, Mr. Alsu.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: You're up early.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Oh, it finally started?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I know, right? It's been two frustrating months, but at least it paid off.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Too bad we're out of booze. Who knows when the next caravan is coming.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: They don't like going out too far in winter.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Using this machine, I'll be able to make some simple parts even without the caravans.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: We could fix that hand pump, for example.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: We can teach the others how to use it. It'll make life a lot easier.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What do you call it... a lathe?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I've heard my son talking about it.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I've been here a while now, but I've never met your son.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: He doesn't work too far from here, but it's on the other side of the mountain, and the roads get really bad in winter.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: The east side? There's a mining zone over there... owned by a nomadic city, I think?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Looks like you know the area.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I asked some questions when trading with that drifter group.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I might have to go again in a few days. Let's hope the snow isn't too bad.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: You should stay away from the wastelanders for a while...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: The taxmen are coming soon. There'll be trouble if they find out we were dealing with the wastelanders.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Trouble?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I don't know about other places, but Lord Fetisov doesn't like us talking to them too much.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: People from the army say that many of them are Kazimierzian spies.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Along with outlaws like the Rusthammers.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: But most of the drifters in that group look like Ursus people.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: It didn't use to be that way...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: In the past, wastelanders mostly came from outside Ursus. They were quickly chased away by Lord Fetisov's guards.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: But now...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Plenty of Ursus have been fleeing their villages and joining the drifters.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: We had more than two hundred people in this village a few years ago, but so many ran in the last couple of years.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: There's no one left to till the soil, and the traders aren't coming anymore.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: The only thing that's increasing is taxes...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Your standard formula for depopulation.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What about your Lord Fetisov? Does he just sit on his thumb while his serfs run away?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I... I'm not sure.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: But he's probably busy dealing with the highwaymen up north.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Highwaymen?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Oh, the bandits the villagers have been talking about?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Who exactly are they?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: It's been a month. What is your lord doing?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Ursus's armies wouldn't have trouble with common bandits, would they?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I'm not sure, but rumors say that they're well-trained, targeting nobles specifically. They're even attacking the army.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I don't know how bandits manage to do that...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Well-trained 'bandits' fighting against the nobility. I've heard that story before.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Too many times.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What do they say? History repeats itself.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Er, you've seen this before?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Oh, no, just an off-hand comment
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Old man! What are you doing here? They're all looking for you!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Take your time, catch your breath.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: You need to hurry home! Your son...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: My son's back?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Wait... why?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Just go! He's in bad shape!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Alsu! You're here! Your son...
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: What happened to my son?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I was getting firewood in the morning when I saw someone lying at the south edge of town.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: I realized it was Anwar when I got closer.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Who knows what might have happened if I didn't stumble across him.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Thank you so much.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I bandaged up wounds. There's no frostbite, so I guess he wasn't there for too long.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Listen to me carefully... your son has Oripathy.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Look at his shoulder.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Oh my...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: The old man takes a step back in shock.
In the span of a few seconds, a multitude of expressions flash across his face - fear, worry, doubt.
At last, it settles on sorrow.
Who else knows?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I haven't told anyone yet.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Please, I beg you...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I know. He's your only son.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: I'll tell people he has wet flu, tell them to stay away from your house for a few days.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: But this is Oripathy. You know what I mean, right? You have some thinking to do.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Thank you... very much...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Doesn't look good?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: M-Mr. Alexsandr?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Y-You shouldn't be here... my son...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Oripathy, right?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Mr. Alexsandr...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'm here to help.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: But... it's Oripathy...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: It's fine. I've seen plenty of Oripathy patients.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Take off his shirt and rub this on the crystalline regions.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Like I said, I've seen my share of Oripathy patients. Do as I say.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: This is for injection. Give me a hand; I need to get some hot water.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: If the crystals begin to seep blood, drip it on this piece of test paper.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: As you say...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: A few minutes later.
Where... where am I...
attributes.name: Young Man

attributes.content: Anwar! You're awake!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: D-Dad? How did I...?
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: It's fine, don't speak, I'm just glad you're back...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Is this... home?
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: No, I can't stay here! I have Oripathy! I...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: I know, I know. Say no more.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Sani was the one who found you. She didn't tell anyone else.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I'll take you into the woods once you're better.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: There's an abandoned hunter's hut there. You can stay there while we figure out what to do.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Dad... I...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Rest for a bit, while I get you water. Stay put.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: You're awake?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Y-You're a mercenary! Why are you in the village?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm a friend of your father's.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Your Oripathy is relatively mild.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I've never seen you before...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: The name is Alexsandr. I came this year.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What happened? I thought you were working at the factory.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: There was a boiler explosion two weeks ago.
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: A few of us came down with Oripathy...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: So the overseer kicked us out.
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: That's all? Were you followed?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: We thought we were being followed at first, but we stopped paying attention after a few days.
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: I wouldn't expect them to let you go so easily...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Never mind. Get some rest.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Mr. Alexsandr... what can I do?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: You face reality.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: But... it's Oripathy...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: A mild case of it. There are many ways to control the symptoms.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: How do you know so much about it?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: It's a long story. There's a more pressing issue right now.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Life in Ursus will not be easy for your son, even if his symptoms are mild.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Argh...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: He'll need to learn to live like the wastelanders.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Like hunters that catch manglers in the wild, he will need to learn to fend for himself.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I can teach him a few things.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: A week later...
Steady...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: (Focuses)
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Steady...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: (Pulls trigger)
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Argh! I missed...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Don't squeeze the trigger too hard. It'll throw off the bolt's trajectory.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I guess I'm just not cut out for this...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: It's too early for that. You've made decent progress, considering it's only been a week.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Live targets are a different animal altogether. Practice makes perfect.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: One hour break, then it's physical training.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: You have a lot to learn, if you want to survive in the wild.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: You know so much, Mr. Alexsandr... did you used to be a soldier?
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: You're a far cry from the typical Ursus soldier.
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: I'm still a soldier.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Where's your dad? It's almost noon.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Maybe he got held up by something?
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Anwar! Pack your things, now!
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: No time! The Infected Patrol Unit is in the village! They've gone to your house!
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Pack your things and get out of here! This place is too close to the village. They'll be here any minute!
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: What about dad? I can't leave him...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Just go! The whole village will be in trouble if they find you!
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: Run!
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: How many?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Two inspectors and five brawlers. They look like they're out for blood.
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: They're all Ursus?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The two inspectors are, I think. Not sure about the others.
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: Anyway, this is no time to chat. You should get out of here too, Mr. Alexsandr.
attributes.name: Sani

attributes.content: Anwar, take your weapon and put on the camo. You're coming with me.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Well? Where is he?
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: He... he didn't...
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Don't give me that. We saw him come into the village. Hand him over.
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: I-I never saw him!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: I swear! It's all true!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Do I look stupid to you?
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: If your son's not here, whose overalls and boots are those? Huh?
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Fine don't talk. We've got plenty of time.
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Please, take me! I'll do hard labor for Lord Fetisov! I'll do anything!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Please, just let my son go!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Pfft. You think hard labor's gonna do it?
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Round up everyone in the village.
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Aye.
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: W-What are you doing?
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: What are we doing? Harboring the Infected is a serious crime.
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: In the name of Lord Fetisov, all your lands are now forfeit!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: We don't know anything about it! This doesn't have anything to do with us!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: We didn't do anything!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Shut your trap and fall in line!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Oh no... I knew this would happen...
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: So that's what they're doing.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Letting the Infected escape on purpose, following them home, all in order to enslave free peasants and confiscate their land.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The perfect excuse.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: This, too, is an old story.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I'll get those criminals, if that's the last thing I do!
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Hold on. Don't make any hasty moves.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: You have a plan?
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Go to the high ground to the east of the village and stay out of sight.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Fire at the brawlers on my signal.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Doesn't matter if you miss. I'll take care of the rest.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Gotcha.
attributes.name: Anwar

attributes.content: Time to clean up.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: House to house? Are you serious?
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Cut the crap and go. You're being paid for a reason.
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Someone's shooting at us!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: What?! From where?
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: East side! On that hill!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: You two! Go around and get him!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Take cover! Take cover!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: What the hell's going on?!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: What are you doing? Return fire!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: No! No!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Where is everybody?
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: There is no one else.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: My leg! My leg!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Stay down.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Or test my patience. Your choice.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Mr. Alsu.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: M-Mr. Alexsandr
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: Tell everyone else to go indoors and stay there.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: A-Alright.
attributes.name: Alsu

attributes.content: H-How dare you... peasants...
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Not so cocky now that it's just you, eh?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Y-You'll pay for this!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Colonel Lomono's unit is just over the hill!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Lord Fetisov won't let this go unpunished! You're dead, you hear me? Dead!
attributes.name: Infected Patrol Unit

attributes.content: Nobles, magnates, boyars.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Is this the best that Ursus has to offer?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Y-You're not Ursus!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: No, I'm not.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I don't really care to meet those high and mighty lords of yours, but I have a friend who wants to meet you.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Let me introduce you to Comrade Degtyaryov.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Tachanka pats his machine gun fondly, cracking a smile beneath his heavy helmet.
Gunshots ring through the winter forest, startling a flock of fowlbeasts.
